Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twcable.grabbit.tools.util.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object

    Useful utility functions.

    • Method Detail

      • throwSoft

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> void throwSoft(T exp)

        Remove checked-ness from the exception. The same exception is still thrown (checked or unchecked), but this removes the compiler’s checks.

      • softened

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> java.lang.RuntimeException softened(T exp)

        Remove checked-ness from the exception. The same exception is returned (checked or unchecked), but this removes the compiler’s checks.

      • writeLine

        public static void writeLine(java.io.Writer writer,
                             java.lang.String line)

        Write the given string to the Writer, followed by the system newline. If there’s an IOException, it’s still thrown, but it’s no longer "checked."

      • flushAndClose

        public static void flushAndClose(@Nullable java.io.Writer writer)

        "Quietly" flush and close the writer. If there’s an IOException, it’s still thrown, but it’s no longer "checked."

      • close

        public static void close(@Nullable java.io.Closeable closeable)

        "Quietly" close the instance. If there’s an IOException, it’s still thrown, but it’s no longer "checked."

      • lineWriter

        public static java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.String> lineWriter(java.io.Writer writer)

        Returns a Consumer that simply invokes writeLine(Writer, String).

        The currying is useful to get around "Writer is not final" compiler errors for lambdas in those situations where you know it’s safe to do so.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                 throws java.io.IOException

        Copies the InputStream to a String. The stream is closed upon completion.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.InputStream source,
                        java.io.OutputStream sink)
                 throws java.io.IOException

        Copies the InputStream into the OutputStream, closing both when complete.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • configAsMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> configAsMap(java.io.File configFile)

        Read in a configuration file — either YAML or JSON — and return its results as a Map.
